text.more: This analysis of proper nouns in Les Misérables maps interactions between characters, places, and organizations, transforming the narrative into a network of connections. This approach identifies key relationships, highlights central elements, and explores the social and spatial structure of the work, revealing fundamental dynamics and interactions in the story.
